HR document template

HR Document Templates are used to create and modify reuseable HR documents.

Document templates

Document templates are created within the HR application and use variables to pre-fill information from tables into the document. You create how the document looks by defining the header, footer, images, placement of footer, and the text within the template. The base system provides default document templates:
  • Employee Verification Letter in Canada
  • Employee Verification Letter in USA
  • Offer Letter Template
  • Education Agreement

PDF document templates

PDF document templates originate from Managed Documents and use field mapping to pre-fill information from tables into the document. You can scan a hard-copy of a document, use it as a template, and map fields on the template to pull information from tables into the document. The base system provides the default PDF document template:
  • Non-Disclosure Agreement (Sample)
